objective: Durability relaunch test (Task + side effects). Step 1: Call Task to spawn subagent_type 'report-creation-expert' that writes a small HTML report to work_products/relaunch_report.html (include a title, 2-3 short sections, and a timestamp). Do not call external search tools. Step 2: Convert that HTML to PDF via Bash (headless Chrome) and save as work_products/relaunch_report.pdf. Step 3: Upload the PDF with mcp__local_toolkit__upload_to_composio and send ONE Gmail email with the PDF attached. Use the email address from env var UA_TEST_EMAIL_TO; if missing, ask the user. Step 4: Reply DONE.
